There are plenty of wonderfully nose-tingling fragrances for fellas out there, but if you’re looking for something really show-stopping, men’s Burberry cologne delivers the goods. Since 1856, Burberry’s striking plaid-style print has been the epitome of cool. Almost everyone loves a bit of Burberry—and whatever your tastes or style—it’s an absolute fashion icon. Now, this iconic brand is bottling up their coolness and offering gentlemen a choice of jaw-dropping scents. The best Burberry cologne for men not only comes in top-notch branded packaging, but it really stands out from the crowd. Like anything in this world, some scents are better than others (there are also lots of cheap knock-offs out there), so we’re going to tell you all about the best Burberry cologne you can buy right now. Key Takeaways These epic Burberry colognes are nothing short of legendary. Take a look at our Burberry cologne for men hit list and pick your nostril-tingling weapon of choice. In This ArticleOur PicksWhat To Look ForFinal VerdictFAQs agentlemansjourney77 / Instagram 1. Best Overall Burberry Cologne: Mr. Burberry Eau de Parfum Notes: Tarragon, Cinnamon, & Patchouli | Size: 5.2 oz, 3.5 oz & 1.7 oz The best Burberry cologne for men in… well, every situation. This classic eau de parfum is a head-turning, sharp-smelling hero. An intense version of the brand’s flagship Mr. Burberry scent, the eau de parfum edition is warm, woody, and deliciously spicy (but don’t try to eat it). This landed the best overall Burberry scent because it’s bold, iconic, and suits every type of man during every single season. What We LikeThe bold and fresh scentThe lingering nature of this iconic cologneWhat we don't likeSome guys might prefer something a little less earthy and spicy 2. Best Affordable Burberry Cologne: The Beat For Men Notes: Citrus and pepper | Size: 1.7 oz Third on our best Burberry cologne for men list is The Beat. This hard-hitting men’s Burberry cologne comes in the kind of bottle that is so cool you could proudly display it on your mantelpiece. Sporting a totally out there but completely irresistible peppery scent, The Beat will make you feel as fresh as a daisy while turning heads wherever you go. A real show-stopper. What We LikeThe eye-catching bottle designThe attention-grabbing citrus and pepper notesWhat we don't likePeppery smells aren’t for everyone 3. Best Winter Burberry Cologne: Brit For Men Notes: Cinnamon, ginger and bergamot | Size: 3 oz Boasting a bouquet like a cozy bearded hug, we’d go as far as to say that Burberry Brit Rhythm is one of the world’s greatest winter fragrances. With a swirling mix of orange, ginger, cinnamon, and bergamot, this epic men’s Burberry cologne is a real winter warmer. As the scent is lingering and comforting in equal measures, this makes a perfect everyday seasonal scent (but it is ideal for special festive occasions, too). What We LikeThe warming seasonal magic of this comforting cologneThe perfect citrus and woody blendWhat we don’t likeIf you like sunny, fruity vibes, another men’s Burberry cologne might suit you better 4. Best Smelling Burberry Cologne: Burberry Weekend Eau De Toilette Notes: Cinnamon, ginger and bergamot | Size: 3.3 oz If you’re looking for something with a punch of pizazz twinned with oaky macho undertones, you’ve come to the right place. Oh yeah, our best Burberry cologne for a night out or special occasion is a zesty number brimming with notes of lemon, orange, and grapefruit. This genius scent will tantalize the nostrils, grab attention, and make you feel like partying all night long. What We LikeThe lively, zesty fragrancesThe signature earthy undertones that give Burberry colognes their legendary statusWhat we don't likeIf citrus isn’t your thing, this probably isn’t the one for you 5. Best Summer Versace Cologne: Versace Eros Eau De Toilette Okay, this isn’t a Burberry cologne (obviously), but Versace is a brand with synergy. These two fashion hard-hitters often collaborate—which is why we thought it would only be right to add Eros to the mix. Versace Eros shares similarities with Burberry’s signature scents, but with an intense freshness finished with striking notes of apple, this is a cologne that delivers the goods on every occasion. A fragrance worth considering if you’re a Burberry fan looking for something a little different in the summer months. What We LikeThe intense freshness and apple notesThe cologne’s versatility and long-lasting qualityWhat we don’t likeIf you want a Burberry-branded scent, you might want to look at our other options 6. Best Rustic Burberry Cologne: Burberry Hero Notes: Cedarwood | Size: 5 oz If you’re looking to make a bold statement with something that is warming, rustic, and earthy—Burberry Hero is the one for you. The warm cedarwood notes and benzoin finish are a powerful tonic that says “I’m manly, but I have a sensitive side” (*imagine someone saying that in a sensual perfume ad voice*). An epic scent for epic fellas. What We LikeThe bold warming scentThe original hints of cedarwoodWhat we don't likeSome dudes might like something a little lighter 7. Best Long-lasting Versace Cologne: Versace Dylan Blue Notes: Grapefruit | Size: 6.7 oz Decidedly slick and lip-smackingly fresh, Versace’s Dylan Blue fragrance boasts nose-tingling grapefruit overtones that will turn even the weariest of heads. Whether you’re looking to make a big first impression or grab attention (the positive kind) on a night out, this vibrant and original scent will linger for hours and hours after putting it on your skin. What We LikeThe lingering fresh scentThe sleek display bottleWhat we don't likeNot everyone is a fan of citrus 8. Best Spring Burberry Cologne: Mr. Burberry Indigo Spray Notes: Mint, Violet, & Sage | Size: 1.05 oz This floral yet super fresh Burberry scent is vibrant and bursting with aromatic notes. It’s a punchy yet head-turning little number that works wonderfully for a spring night out. And although it comes in a small package, a tiny spritz of this stuff will make a big statement. Epic. What We LikeThe woody yet minty notesThe lingering freshnessWhat we don't likeIt does come in quite a small bottle What To Look For In Burberry Colognes For Men Scent First of all, depending on your preferences, you should consider the main scent of a potential Burberry cologne. Each Burberry cologne for men has a unique signature scent. Some are floral and fruity, while others give off that musky, manly kind of smell. So, take a look at the ingredients of every cologne in your shortlist, check the fragrance description, and you’ll land on your dream aroma. Size When you’re choosing a Burberry cologne, size matters. Some bottles are bigger than others (naturally), and you should pick accordingly, depending on how often you’re likely to wear your new scent. If your brand new Burberry cologne for men is strictly for special occasions, a smaller dose will do. But if you’re going to use this as your sweet-smelling daily staple, going big is a good idea. agentlemansjourney77 / Instagram How long does it last? Expanding on the last point: you should check how long your new cologne lasts before pressing the ‘buy’ button. Every cologne has a shelf life, and the last thing you want is to invest in a legendary Burberry fragrance only to let it go off. So, think about how often you’re going to use your new scent, and don’t forget to check the expiry date. Season Last but certainly not least, it’s a good idea to pick a scent based on the season. If you’re a style-conscious gent who likes to switch it up to suit each season, you’ll probably want a scent that fits your look like an aromatic glove. Some Burberry colognes are earthy and offer a little winter warmth, while others have vibrant citrus tones that are ideal for spring or summer. Think about when you want to wear your new cologne, explore the range of scents on offer, and you will find your dream Burberry fragrance in a flash. Final Verdict Burberry is a fashion brand known for excellence. Mr. Burberry’s Eau De Toilette may be our overall best Burberry cologne for men (it really is an epic scent), but each cologne on this list was picked because it’s a cut above the rest. Every choice is balanced, on-trend, and boasts a scent that will turn heads wherever you go. Take the time to explore the range, follow our what-to-look-for tips, and you cannot lose. Best of luck. And if you’re looking for extra inspiration for your cologne-hunting efforts, check out our legendary guide to the best men’s fragrances of all time. Like the brand’s fashion garments, their scents all offer something a little different. For example, each cologne in this guide has a list of its individual essences. While some Burberry colognes are made specifically for men, there are unisex options available, including the brand’s popular Burberry Body. There are plenty of wonderfully nose-tingling fragrances for fellas out there, but if you’re looking for something really show-stopping, men’s Burberry cologne delivers the goods.

Since 1856, Burberry’s striking plaid-style print has been the epitome of cool. Almost everyone loves a bit of Burberry—and whatever your tastes or style—it’s an absolute fashion icon.

Now, this iconic brand is bottling up their coolness and offering gentlemen a choice of jaw-dropping scents. The best Burberry cologne for men not only comes in top-notch branded packaging, but it really stands out from the crowd.

Like anything in this world, some scents are better than others (there are also lots of cheap knock-offs out there), so we’re going to tell you all about the best Burberry cologne you can buy right now.

Key Takeaways

These epic Burberry colognes are nothing short of legendary. Take a look at our Burberry cologne for men hit list and pick your nostril-tingling weapon of choice.


In This Article

  1. Our Picks
  2. What To Look For
  3. Final Verdict
  4. FAQs

1. Best Overall Burberry Cologne: Mr. Burberry Eau de Parfum

Notes: Tarragon, Cinnamon, & Patchouli | Size: 5.2 oz, 3.5 oz & 1.7 oz

The best Burberry cologne for men in… well, every situation. This classic eau de parfum is a head-turning, sharp-smelling hero.

An intense version of the brand’s flagship Mr. Burberry scent, the eau de parfum edition is warm, woody, and deliciously spicy (but don’t try to eat it). This landed the best overall Burberry scent because it’s bold, iconic, and suits every type of man during every single season.

What We Like

  • The bold and fresh scent
  • The lingering nature of this iconic cologne

What we don't like

  • Some guys might prefer something a little less earthy and spicy

2. Best Affordable Burberry Cologne: The Beat For Men

Notes: Citrus and pepper | Size: 1.7 oz

Third on our best Burberry cologne for men list is The Beat. This hard-hitting men’s Burberry cologne comes in the kind of bottle that is so cool you could proudly display it on your mantelpiece.

Sporting a totally out there but completely irresistible peppery scent, The Beat will make you feel as fresh as a daisy while turning heads wherever you go. A real show-stopper.

What We Like

  • The eye-catching bottle design
  • The attention-grabbing citrus and pepper notes

What we don't like

  • Peppery smells aren’t for everyone

3. Best Winter Burberry Cologne: Brit For Men

Notes: Cinnamon, ginger and bergamot | Size: 3 oz

Boasting a bouquet like a cozy bearded hug, we’d go as far as to say that Burberry Brit Rhythm is one of the world’s greatest winter fragrances.

With a swirling mix of orange, ginger, cinnamon, and bergamot, this epic men’s Burberry cologne is a real winter warmer. As the scent is lingering and comforting in equal measures, this makes a perfect everyday seasonal scent (but it is ideal for special festive occasions, too).

What We Like

  • The warming seasonal magic of this comforting cologne
  • The perfect citrus and woody blend

What we don’t like

  • If you like sunny, fruity vibes, another men’s Burberry cologne might suit you better

4. Best Smelling Burberry Cologne: Burberry Weekend Eau De Toilette

Notes: Cinnamon, ginger and bergamot | Size: 3.3 oz

If you’re looking for something with a punch of pizazz twinned with oaky macho undertones, you’ve come to the right place.

Oh yeah, our best Burberry cologne for a night out or special occasion is a zesty number brimming with notes of lemon, orange, and grapefruit. This genius scent will tantalize the nostrils, grab attention, and make you feel like partying all night long.

What We Like

  • The lively, zesty fragrances
  • The signature earthy undertones that give Burberry colognes their legendary status

What we don't like

  • If citrus isn’t your thing, this probably isn’t the one for you

5. Best Summer Versace Cologne: Versace Eros Eau De Toilette

Okay, this isn’t a Burberry cologne (obviously), but Versace is a brand with synergy. These two fashion hard-hitters often collaborate—which is why we thought it would only be right to add Eros to the mix.

Versace Eros shares similarities with Burberry’s signature scents, but with an intense freshness finished with striking notes of apple, this is a cologne that delivers the goods on every occasion. A fragrance worth considering if you’re a Burberry fan looking for something a little different in the summer months.

What We Like

  • The intense freshness and apple notes
  • The cologne’s versatility and long-lasting quality

What we don’t like

  • If you want a Burberry-branded scent, you might want to look at our other options

6. Best Rustic Burberry Cologne: Burberry Hero

Notes: Cedarwood | Size: 5 oz

If you’re looking to make a bold statement with something that is warming, rustic, and earthy—Burberry Hero is the one for you.

The warm cedarwood notes and benzoin finish are a powerful tonic that says “I’m manly, but I have a sensitive side” (*imagine someone saying that in a sensual perfume ad voice*). An epic scent for epic fellas.

What We Like

  • The bold warming scent
  • The original hints of cedarwood

What we don't like

  • Some dudes might like something a little lighter

7. Best Long-lasting Versace Cologne: Versace Dylan Blue

Notes: Grapefruit | Size: 6.7 oz

Decidedly slick and lip-smackingly fresh, Versace’s Dylan Blue fragrance boasts nose-tingling grapefruit overtones that will turn even the weariest of heads.

Whether you’re looking to make a big first impression or grab attention (the positive kind) on a night out, this vibrant and original scent will linger for hours and hours after putting it on your skin.

What We Like

  • The lingering fresh scent
  • The sleek display bottle

What we don't like

  • Not everyone is a fan of citrus

8. Best Spring Burberry Cologne: Mr. Burberry Indigo Spray

Notes: Mint, Violet, & Sage | Size: 1.05 oz

This floral yet super fresh Burberry scent is vibrant and bursting with aromatic notes.

It’s a punchy yet head-turning little number that works wonderfully for a spring night out. And although it comes in a small package, a tiny spritz of this stuff will make a big statement. Epic.

What We Like

  • The woody yet minty notes
  • The lingering freshness

What we don't like

  • It does come in quite a small bottle

What To Look For In Burberry Colognes For Men

Scent

First of all, depending on your preferences, you should consider the main scent of a potential Burberry cologne.

Each Burberry cologne for men has a unique signature scent. Some are floral and fruity, while others give off that musky, manly kind of smell. So, take a look at the ingredients of every cologne in your shortlist, check the fragrance description, and you’ll land on your dream aroma.

Size

When you’re choosing a Burberry cologne, size matters. Some bottles are bigger than others (naturally), and you should pick accordingly, depending on how often you’re likely to wear your new scent.

If your brand new Burberry cologne for men is strictly for special occasions, a smaller dose will do. But if you’re going to use this as your sweet-smelling daily staple, going big is a good idea.

How long does it last?

Expanding on the last point: you should check how long your new cologne lasts before pressing the ‘buy’ button.

Every cologne has a shelf life, and the last thing you want is to invest in a legendary Burberry fragrance only to let it go off. So, think about how often you’re going to use your new scent, and don’t forget to check the expiry date.

Season

Last but certainly not least, it’s a good idea to pick a scent based on the season. If you’re a style-conscious gent who likes to switch it up to suit each season, you’ll probably want a scent that fits your look like an aromatic glove.

Some Burberry colognes are earthy and offer a little winter warmth, while others have vibrant citrus tones that are ideal for spring or summer. Think about when you want to wear your new cologne, explore the range of scents on offer, and you will find your dream Burberry fragrance in a flash.

Final Verdict

Burberry is a fashion brand known for excellence.

Mr. Burberry’s Eau De Toilette may be our overall best Burberry cologne for men (it really is an epic scent), but each cologne on this list was picked because it’s a cut above the rest.

Every choice is balanced, on-trend, and boasts a scent that will turn heads wherever you go. Take the time to explore the range, follow our what-to-look-for tips, and you cannot lose.

Best of luck. And if you’re looking for extra inspiration for your cologne-hunting efforts, check out our legendary guide to the best men’s fragrances of all time.

1. Best Overall Burberry Cologne: Mr. Burberry Eau de Parfum

Notes: Tarragon, Cinnamon, & Patchouli | Size: 5.2 oz, 3.5 oz & 1.7 oz

An intense version of the brand’s flagship Mr. Burberry scent, the eau de parfum edition is warm, woody, and deliciously spicy (but don’t try to eat it). This landed the best overall Burberry scent because it’s bold, iconic, and suits every type of man during every single season.

What To Look For In Burberry Colognes For Men

Scent

First of all, depending on your preferences, you should consider the main scent of a potential Burberry cologne.

Each Burberry cologne for men has a unique signature scent. Some are floral and fruity, while others give off that musky, manly kind of smell. So, take a look at the ingredients of every cologne in your shortlist, check the fragrance description, and you’ll land on your dream aroma.

Size

When you’re choosing a Burberry cologne, size matters. Some bottles are bigger than others (naturally), and you should pick accordingly, depending on how often you’re likely to wear your new scent.

If your brand new Burberry cologne for men is strictly for special occasions, a smaller dose will do. But if you’re going to use this as your sweet-smelling daily staple, going big is a good idea.

How long does it last?

Expanding on the last point: you should check how long your new cologne lasts before pressing the ‘buy’ button.

Every cologne has a shelf life, and the last thing you want is to invest in a legendary Burberry fragrance only to let it go off. So, think about how often you’re going to use your new scent, and don’t forget to check the expiry date.

Season

Last but certainly not least, it’s a good idea to pick a scent based on the season. If you’re a style-conscious gent who likes to switch it up to suit each season, you’ll probably want a scent that fits your look like an aromatic glove.

Some Burberry colognes are earthy and offer a little winter warmth, while others have vibrant citrus tones that are ideal for spring or summer. Think about when you want to wear your new cologne, explore the range of scents on offer, and you will find your dream Burberry fragrance in a flash.
